data.subHeading: Get Help regarding your recent transactions only in one click on freecharge business app

value.label: How to change my password
value.value:
Please follow the below steps

1. Go to Account from the bottom navigation bar
2. Now click on reset password.
3. Post entering your new password click on Save.
You would need to re-login into your account with the new password.
